hero.headline: Stronger Every Day
hero.subheadline: Ironworks Fitness is a CrossFit-style gym in Chicago's West Loop offering group classes, personal training, and nutrition coaching. Whether you are a seasoned athlete or stepping into a gym for the first time, our coaches meet you where you are and push you further.

services.headline: Our Classes
services.subheadline: Six training disciplines designed to build strength, endurance, and mobility at every fitness level

items.title: CrossFit
items.description: Our flagship program. Constantly varied functional movements performed at high intensity. Every workout is scalable — whether you are lifting 95 pounds or 295, the stimulus is the same. Classes run daily at 6am, 7am, 12pm, 5pm, and 6:30pm.

items.title: HIIT
items.description: High-intensity interval training combining bodyweight movements, kettlebells, and cardio bursts. 45-minute sessions designed to maximize calorie burn and metabolic conditioning. No barbell experience required.

items.title: Olympic Lifting
items.description: Dedicated sessions for the snatch and clean & jerk. Our USAW-certified coaches break down technique from the ground up, with programming for competition prep and general strength athletes alike.

items.title: Yoga & Mobility
items.description: Active recovery sessions combining vinyasa yoga, dynamic stretching, and foam rolling. Designed specifically for strength athletes who need to improve flexibility, reduce soreness, and prevent injury.

items.title: Endurance
items.description: Running, rowing, and assault bike conditioning for members training for races, obstacle courses, or general cardiovascular fitness. Programming follows periodized cycles from base building through race-day peaking.

items.title: Nutrition Coaching
items.description: One-on-one nutrition guidance based on your goals — whether that is fat loss, muscle gain, or fueling for performance. Includes macro planning, weekly check-ins, and habit-based coaching. No crash diets, no fads.

pricing.headline: Membership Plans
pricing.subheadline: Flexible options from drop-ins to unlimited access — no long-term contracts required

tiers.name: Drop-In
tiers.description: Single class pass for visitors and travelers

features.text: Access to any single group class
Full facility access during class time

tiers.name: Monthly Unlimited
tiers.description: Our most popular plan — unlimited classes and open gym

tiers.name: Annual
tiers.description: Best value — save over $480 compared to monthly billing

features.text: 2 free personal training sessions per month

team.headline: Our Coaches
team.subheadline: Certified professionals committed to your progress, safety, and results

members.name: Marcus Cole
members.title: Head Coach & Owner
members.bio: CrossFit Level 3 Trainer, USAW Level 2 Coach. Former collegiate wrestler who founded Ironworks in 2019. Specializes in Olympic lifting and competitor programming. Has coached 40+ athletes to CrossFit regionals.

members.name: Tanya Reyes
members.title: Coach — HIIT & Endurance
members.bio: NASM Certified Personal Trainer, CrossFit Level 2. Ultramarathon runner and obstacle course racer. Brings infectious energy to every class and specializes in helping beginners build confidence.

members.name: Jake Lindstrom
members.title: Coach — Strength & Olympic Lifting
members.bio: CSCS, USAW Level 1 Coach. Competitive powerlifter with a 1,400-pound total. Patient, technical coaching style focused on movement quality. Runs our barbell club and competition prep track.

members.name: Dr. Alana Kim
members.title: Nutrition & Wellness Coach
members.bio: Registered Dietitian with a doctorate in Sports Nutrition from the University of Illinois. Combines evidence-based macro programming with sustainable habit coaching. Worked with Division I athletes before joining Ironworks.

items.quote: I walked into Ironworks two years ago unable to do a single pull-up. Last month I completed my first CrossFit competition. The coaches here do not just program workouts — they build athletes. This place changed my life.

As a 45-year-old mom of three, I was intimidated by the idea of a CrossFit gym. Tanya made me feel welcome from day one, and every workout is scaled to my level. I am stronger, more energetic, and sleeping better than I have in years.

The nutrition coaching with Dr. Kim was a game-changer. I lost 30 pounds without cutting out food groups or starving myself. She taught me how to fuel my training properly and the results speak for themselves.

items.caption: Main training floor with competition rigs, platforms, and assault bikes
Morning CrossFit class working through a barbell complex
Olympic lifting platform area with bumper plates and competition bars
HIIT class in action with kettlebells and box jumps
Yoga and mobility session in the recovery studio
Locker room and lounge area with protein bar and cold plunge

services.name: Free Trial Class
services.description: Experience a full CrossFit or HIIT class with coaching scaled to your level. No experience necessary. Just bring water and athletic shoes.

services.name: Personal Training Session
services.description: One-on-one coaching focused on your individual goals — strength, technique, competition prep, or general fitness. Custom programming included.

services.name: Nutrition Consultation
services.description: Initial consultation with Dr. Alana Kim to assess your current diet, set goals, and build a sustainable nutrition plan tailored to your training and lifestyle.

contact.successMessage: Got it. A coach will reach out within 24 hours to get you started.
contact.headline: Get Started
contact.description: Questions about classes, memberships, or just want to learn more? Drop us a line and we will get back to you fast.

brand.name: Ironworks Fitness
brand.description: CrossFit-style gym in Chicago's West Loop. Group classes, personal training, and nutrition coaching since 2019.
